name: Rainer
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 34 (Themes: Growing, Two button controls)

Make it rain!

Cultivate the best land possible by balancing sunshine and rain. Press Space to rain and Right to move on to the next plot of land. Try not to flood or burn your land!

Tools used:

Unity

Reason (music)

cfxr (sound effects)

This was my first try at a 3D jam project in Unity. I hope you enjoy it! :)
